website_summaries.verdict: Both long-term fans and new purchasers of Inov-8 cross-trainers rejoiced at the refreshed iteration of the F-Lite 230. They were impressed with the shoe’s performance and minimalist vibe. Overall, the trainer excelled at everything that is expected of a quality CrossFit footwear.
pros: Intended as a CrossFit shoe, the F-Lite 230 pleasantly surprised lots of buyers with its utility for cross-training
The shoe’s light and minimalist feel resonated well with the majority of purchasers
Many buyers pointed out that the trainer ran true to size and fit as expected right out of the box
It was described as a comfortable training shoe by most wearers
Multiple users took note of the shoe’s grippy graphene outsole
cons: An expert noted that the shoe's flexible sole may not be the most stable for Olympic weightlifting
Several people griped about the laces as one shoestring was longer than the other

customer_reviews.title: Distinctive look!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of this brand for sometime now, this is my 5th pair or so. With this model I went half a size larger and they fit perfectly. I don't like brands that everyone wears, I like it when people ask me about them at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fitting is on point. Inov8 makes great stuff. This is my second pair and they seem similar to my last. The rubber on their shoes seem to be the most durable I’ve experienced. I’ve worn these on about three runs now and they feel great. Although they’re truly a light duty shoe, these aren’t some everyday wear kind of foot-wear. Like my last the mesh seems like it’ll tear easy so watch out where and how you step/run. These did tear the first time I laced up, the tongue shoelace holder thing. Still they feel and run great I always recommend inov8
customer_reviews.author: Jamie237

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TRAINING SHOE!
customer_reviews.text: This company is a hidden gym in the fitness industry... Great shoes to train in, walk in or wear all day long. If you know your proper SHOE SIZE you will not have any difficulty with size on these. Order your regular size and you will be fine. This is a great looking shoe as well as function. If you are looking for a great gym shoe or something to wear all day with no foot pain, look no further.. Get a pair today!
customer_reviews.author: HK45CT5150

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy and narrow
customer_reviews.text: Had the old 195 which is not available anymore, best shoe every, two Marathons. Needed new, but these are narrow and heavy like a brick. Why change winning horses? Zero, stars, returned.
customer_reviews.author: Los Angelinos

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight training shoe
customer_reviews.text: I loved the ASICS MetConviction shoe for crossfit. They were lightweight, flat and durable. The model was discontinued a few years back and I have been searching for a similar replacement. The search is over! My new INOV-8 F-Lite 230's are exactly what I've been looking for with all the same features. They are rock solid running, jumping and lifting. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: MPT

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. The width is a little narrow. I have owned many different inov8 shoes, and am always the same size. These just happen to be narrower than all the others. That being said I will have to switch the laces out for longer ones to be able to tie them. Overall they look amazing and feel great walking in them. More comfortable than expected. The sole of the shoe is very grippy. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, stylish. Only complaint is that the laces come untied fairly often. Double knotting will help with these type of laces.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Han

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow...
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these in the past for training days where I don't need more stability for lifts and I have to say these 230's seem more narrow than in the past. I had to return them because they just don't fit the same....
customer_reviews.author: Mav2Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good minimalist running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a minimalist running shoe. These shoes have been working well for that purpose. Firm and responsive, obviously you'd want to avoid running in these of you are a heel striker. The graphene soles seem to be a bit more grippy on wet asphalt than other running shoes. Hopefully, they also wear a little slower as well. Fit is right in line with other Inov-8 shoes I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Guilday

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! Not the most consistent sizes.
customer_reviews.text: I've loved Inov8s since my first pair of 230s and 195s and was very please to see their return to my favorite colors but was a little frustrated-yet not surprised the the sizing's slightly off. My first pair years ago was 11 UK M. My 2nd and 3rd pairs were 10.5. I just got the new 10.5 and my toes up against the end. Had similar problem with my fast lists. In short I love the shoes just hate finding the right size.
customer_reviews.author: mary burgoon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I love the shoes. They're sold as a training shoe but I just did a half marathon in this pair. There's enough support for me to do this and it also really helps my foot strike be mid or just forward of mid foot. When I run in shoes with a bigger drop or a taller foot bed I don't feel stable at all. I love their slogan. I'll buy another pair when I wear these out.
customer_reviews.author: Edith Burch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just got home from work and Got these in the mail Never heard of inov until amazon But 10 or of 10 they fit just right there comfy better than Nike to me and no I’m not and employee Company I’d based out of UK I’m In the US.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Inov-8!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for almost any activity. I use them for walking. I've been wearing Inov-8 shoes for almost 10 years and have never had a complaint.
customer_reviews.author: pmgriffith

customer_reviews.title: Second Inov-8
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. I bought my first one 8 years ago--F-195?. Loved them. It's not quite like that. I don't feel as low to the ground (which may be psychological), but it does feel great! I have a fallen arch on my right foot, so I like "minimal" shoes. I wear to work where I am on my feet for 10-12 hours. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Aashish Patel

customer_reviews.title: Great for running and crossfit
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They arent completely minimalist but they still provide a stable lifting base. My favorite thing about them is I can run in them and not hurt. The sole is flexible unlike the nanos I have which kill my legs when I run distance in them.
customer_reviews.author: jesse abrahams

customer_reviews.title: Runs too small
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and couldn’t give it to the person until after return window closed. They only had UK sizes in stock. Ordered the Men’s UK 6 as it is supposed to be equal to a men’s US 7, it’s not even close. They could barely get their foot in the shoe and when they did the entire shoe was too small. Length, width, toe box, all. Now I’m stuck with a $125 shoe and nobody who can wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Good sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These fit great and look great. I don’t use them as trainers. I use them for casual wear.
customer_reviews.author: Luc R.

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe
customer_reviews.text: The only shoe I can run in. Fits close , super flexible, not clunky. Barefoot style that I love
customer_reviews.author: evie

customer_reviews.title: Low profile tennis shoe perfect for training
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a flatter shoe for workout. I normally workout barefoot but, because of Covid we are now required to wear shoes. I love the color and like the feel and fit. Wore them for a couple hours yesterday. Feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Kujawa Bigger

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love my other Inov-8s and these are no exception. Super comfy, light and RED! Good room in the toe box without that paddle-like look. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rio

customer_reviews.title: Fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: How do you possibly get a pair of shoes with different length original laces? Seriously, one is 45" the other is 52" I would really like to replace them with original laces of the same length (both the same that is)... The star rating is for the shoe, not including the laces issue
customer_reviews.author: KNR - NH

customer_reviews.title: Lite
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women’s 12. My 10.5 men’s fit perfect and so lite weight!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: solid shoe
customer_reviews.text: Using these shoes for Crossfit for years now and they are my perfect go to shoe for transitioning from olympic lifts to gymnastics to running
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have hiked for miles in USA, Ireland, Iceland, and Scotland in my green f-lite 230’s. Got the new style in blue as they had no green. Hitting the Northern shore of Lake Superior in Canada!! Breaking them in and of course bringing my old ones as back up. I love these shoes! Won’t hike without them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoe
customer_reviews.text: Mostly used for functional type fitness workouts. Great for treadmill runs. I run about an average of 3-4 miles on the treadmill mixed in with some weight training, these shoes look and feel great!
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! Stylish and comfortable and really great to work out in!
customer_reviews.author: Lynette McBryne

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Slightly tight in the middle but overall a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie O.

customer_reviews.title: Toe box isn’t as wide as original 230’s
customer_reviews.text: Toe box isn’t as wide as the original 230, but wider then the original 195’s. The new mesh material looks like it will last longer then the end of design.
customer_reviews.author: William Payne

customer_reviews.title: A classic CrossFit shoe is back and better than ever!
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling shoe a little more narrow than the FLite 235s.Thee are great for running lifting and ploy metrics a great all around shoes. These are light flexible and appear to have better durability than previous Inov-8 models.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Dluzak

customer_reviews.title: Laces too short
customer_reviews.text: Shoes very confortable and super light weight. Laces too short. I can’t tight shoe laces.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Inov-8 shoes for years and love the little to no heel to toe drop.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Ensure size translates
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of this particular model. Feels tighter than last two pairs and the shoe strings appear to be of different lengths.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent feel toe to heel
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe if you enjoy the minimalist feel with enough support to work out in. Very comfortable, zero break-in required.
customer_reviews.author: GJones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes
customer_reviews.text: Use these to wear to work and for crossfit workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best comfort Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Only shoes I have worn that dont hurt my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Crumpler

customer_reviews.title: Yes, these are running shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Having just run in a new pair of 230s, I want to disagree with many reviews, here, that claim this is not a running shoe. I'm not a minimalist fanatic, but I like a low drop shoe with a hard and responsive sole... something that will protect my foot, but not rob me of my power. The 230 easily fits that description. If you like Salming Race, Pearl Izumi N0 or N1, Merrill Road Glove or Bare Access, or Mizuno wave ekiden, the 230s will feel like nicely protective running shoes for any distance. IMO, they also have a nice responsive amount of spring to them. I plan to train and race in them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. Chalke

product_meta.title: Inov8 F-Lite 230 Training Shoes - AW19
product_meta.description: Inov8 F-Lite 230 Training Shoes The F-Lite 230 training shoe from Inov8 is the ultimate gym shoe; lightweight and breathable but durable and grippy, it is ideal for tackling intense CrossFit workouts with increased durability and versatility. Inov8 Shoe Fit Scale For technical footwear, a good fit is essential to enhance your performance. Inov8's new Shoe Fit Scale makes it easier to find the perfect fitting shoe. All Inov8 shoes are designed with Met-Cradle technology to lock down the mid-foot for a stable hold, where they differ is in the toe box. The shoes are now graded from 1 to 5, Grade 1 representing their closest, most precise fit and Grade 5 representing the widest fitting toe box. The lower the number on the scale, the narrower the fit, which ensures minimal internal movement of the foot when running fast on technical terrain. Shoes with the higher numbers on the scale will suit athletes with a wider foot and those wanting that extra comfort in the toe box. This wider toe box allows the toes to splay for increased stability when lifting heavy weights. It's also perfect for longer runs and races when toes begin to swell. Inov8 have graded the F-Lite 230 Training Shoes as Grade 2. Breathable Mesh Upper The upper of the F-Lite 230 is made from an incredibly lightweight mesh fabric. This allows you to train unrestricted and with full freedom of movement. The upper is constructed from an internally structured one piece, which allows the shoe to adapt to the situation it is in. The fabric used is highly breathable, which is crucial during intense training sessions. As well as allowing ventilation to the foot, cooling the wearer during exercise, the shoe allows sweat molecules to leave the skin and pass to the surface of the fabric, where it can then be evaporated. This results in the wearer being fresh and dry - and ready to tackle their session with maximum efficiency. Additionally, supporting the midfoot and securing lockdown the F-lite 230 utilis
feature_bullets: Breathable mesh - Cools the foot, leaving you fresh and dry.
Met cradle - Cradles midsection to eyelets, providing a secure hold.
Toe bumper - Durable protection from damage and burpee fatigue.
EVA midsole - Offers protection and comfort.
